metadata.h1: The Official Olive Garden Drink Menu 2025? Every Price! 🍹
metadata.description: What's on the Olive Garden Drink Menu? 🍹 We've got the full list of lemonades, cocktails, and wines, with prices. Find your perfect sip here! 👇

author.name: The Olive Garden Menu Guide Team

data.htmlContent: Ready to get your sip on? 😉 The Olive Garden drink menu is where the party's at! Whether you're craving a bottomless Raspberry Lemonade (a true icon!) or a classy cocktail to go with your breadsticks, they've got you covered. Let's dive into all the delicious drink options for 2025! 🚀

items.question: Does the Olive Garden Drink menu have free refills?
items.answer: You know it! ✅ Olive Garden hooks you up with FREE refills on all their soft drinks, lemonades, teas, and even the 'Caffè la Toscana'. Drink up!

items.question: What non-alcoholic drinks are on the menu?
items.answer: Tons! You can grab Italian Bottled Water if you're feeling fancy, or go for their legendary Raspberry Lemonade, Classic Lemonade, Iced Teas, and all the usual fountain drinks. 🥤

items.question: Are there kid-friendly drinks at Olive Garden?
items.answer: Of course! The little ones are covered with options like Milk, Fruit Juices, and yummy Lemonade. They won't be left out of the fun. 🙌

items.question: Does Olive Garden have a full bar?
items.answer: Yes, most Olive Garden locations have a full bar! They serve a variety of cocktails, beers, and a pretty impressive wine list. So whether you want a classic Italian Peroni or a fruity cocktail, you're in luck. 🍸

items.question: Can I sample a wine before buying a glass?
items.answer: Definitely! Olive Garden is famous for its complimentary wine tasting. You can typically sample up to three different wines to find the one you love before committing to a glass or bottle. Just ask your server for a taste!
